Text: Execution Ratefinancial deal execution rate for Enron North America and Riskmantra natural gas and liquids for the period between January and October as of December has reached a record high of on a total of deals with deals being executed and or expirednot executed but cleared with only deals remaining open for this period The represents an increase from in March execution rate This is record territory due in no small part to teams working together toward a common goal of establishing the best relationship with our customers and a execution rate This is Enrons Visions and Values applied Congradulations to all of the following teams for a job well done Deal Compliance Legal and Credit This is truly a fitting ending for an outstanding Happy Holidays Willie L Harrell

Re Organizational Announcement Cc all on your promotions Global Rates Department headed by James Scribner Sr Director Steve Venturatos Director Michael Eiben Manager wish to extend an invitation to all to call upon the GRS group for any future needs that we may offer you to help in your continued march toward an outstanding career here at Enron You may call Willie Harrell or Kelly Lombardi for assistance at any time Thank You Willie Harrell Enron North America Corp From Louise Kitchen Philippe Bibi ENRON AM Sent by Enron NRON To ENWEmployees cc Subject Organizational Announcement We are pleased to announce the following promotions within Enron Net Works These promotions will be effective February We would like to thank these individuals for their past contributions and recognize their instrumental roles in the growth and success of the organization Please join us in congratulating the following employees and wishing them continued success with Enron To Managing Director Sally Global Rates Cc Congradulation to the IT team headed by Jeremy Wong and Francis Lim for the outstanding work in revising the Global Rates posting processes performed by Eduardo Calderon and Cecilia Cheung As a result of the revisions the following is now possible CQG and Telerate is now a backup for Reuters in posting daily settlement prices for options and futures for all commodities The revised spreadsheet is more user friendly with the ability to download prices immediately after settle prices are known Errors can be corrected without IT assistance Crosschecking vendors settlement prices for accuracy can be done without the usual delays Adding and revising commodity terms can now be performed by global rate personnel instead of an IT function Finally endusers satisfaction has been improved to nearly Again thank you guys for a job well done Willie Harrell Global Rates

Global Rates Cc PST Reminder I will out on vacation Thursday and Friday December th th Please contact Cecilia Cheung for assistance in my absence Cecilia my home phone Cell Due in Pub Posting on Thursday December NX NX NX NXD NX NX Post the above rates in Excel after futures download is completed Odrive Click on clntSvc Click on ksettle Click on NYMEXSTLxls Then Post the same rates in ERMSPub Postings for January Click on Quote Deals click on Otc click on Pub Posting In Expiration Date box type Jan click on F in Pub Code box enter nx Click on F Locate the above codes in the listings Post Rates Click on F after each entry or you may try clicking on F after all rates are posted Call me if you need me Thanks Cecilia for your assistance See you guys on Monday December wlh

College GraduationPST In the midst of much sorry comes some joy You are all cordially invited to my graduation ceremony from Letourneau University Date Thursday December Time pm Location Metropolitan Baptist Church Jones Road Houston Texas Interested Parties please contact me for questions or further inquiries Work Home Cell Email or Let us continue to be prayerful and do the very best job that we can Thank You Willie Harrell

Re BP AmocoI have informed BP Amoco I spoke to Bill a VP who informed that the telephone number that the person that called me is not a BP Amoco line however the fax number is a one that is in their trading room I was also told that Michelle Reasor is the trader and would have been the one making any inquiry requests of us He investigating He highly complemented us on our security measures Thanks Willie

Re BP AmocoI have informed BP Amoco I spoke to Bill a VP who informed that the telephone number that the person that called me is not a BP Amoco line however the fax number is a one that is in their trading room I was also told that Michelle Reasor is the trader and would have been the one making any inquiry requests of us He investigating He highly complemented us on our security measures Thanks Willie
Re Dow Jones Index West Desk Cc I am currently awaiting the curve codes to be setup in Enpower pub posting Rates will be posted curve codes are created Thanks wlh

New EnPower Settlement Indices Cc Forwarded by Willie HarrellHOUECT on PM Kate Symes PM To Willie CT cc Subject New EnPower Settlement Indices Willie Per our conversation the West Power desk needs three new settlement indices for entering swaps deals in EnPower The indices are as follows Last day settle for MIDC NYMEX contract Last day average for PALO VERDE NYMEX contract Last day average for COB NYMEX contract Please let me know if you have any questions The first index is a little more pressing than the other two one of our traders did a futures deal a week ago which we have yet to swap from his book to the one it belongs in We cant execute the swap until we have a MIDC settlement index Thank you so much for your help Kate

Re New EnPower Settlement Indices Cc Kate I have done extensive research to obtain the Nymex prices that you have requested and I have concluded the following Nymex website does not show a code for Nymex MIDC contract Nymex Palo Verde KV and Nymex COB MW do not show settlement prices for these power contracts Finally are you sure these are Nymex contracts I have checked the Nymex website at under Markets Commodity Codes Futures and Options Data Nymex Divisions Futures Contracts MIDC PV and COB Electricity Settlement Data without results Stacey White Enpower Pub Posting Kimat Singla Risks and Jeremy Wong IT have no idea on the locations of the prices in Nymex Can you possibly get with the trader that made the deal to fill us in on the location to these prices or if he will supply us with the prices that he wants posted Thanks wlh
Re New CTPY Name Request Cc Kate I have forward your request to Samuel Schott in Global Counterparty He can be reached at If I can be of further service please call me wlh
